A pebble-stepper element in the vertical layout for narrow screen sizes when your labels are too long or when you have too many steps. You can use "div" with class step-badge-content to provide contents in the badge.

Different style variables sets the styles and dimensions for all the pebble-stepper elements. See the element documentation for different variables available. You can use a "div" with class step-details to provide description for any step.

A pebble-stepper in the horizontal layout for bigger screen sizes
